abstract: There’s yet another round of reorganization at Citigroup, as the banking giant rejiggers its Citi Finance team.
snippet: There’s yet another round of reorganization at Citigroup, as the banking giant rejiggers its Citi Finance team.
lead_paragraph: When an internal memorandum is accompanied by an organizational chart, it’s safe to assume the news will be a little complicated.

headline.main: Citi Shakes Up Its Financial Executive Corps
